text:
maybe that’s all you wanted after he got rejected. So let me know.
I hate being shut out my kids lives, but that’s your call.
On 12/19/2024 at 01:18 PM, Christine Moyer wrote:
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/19/2024 at 01:36 PM)
Subject:Re: Adrian’s Math
Ok. Confirming Adrian pick up at 3:45 at bus stop today by Alan.
Math - Adrian and I are reviewing the materials sent by the school over break and I will provide feedback once school starts.
On 12/19/2024 at 01:13 PM, Robert Moyer wrote:
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/19/2024 at 01:14 PM)
Subject:Re: Adrian’s Math
Thanks. I have a very long list of things I have not seen a response on. How do we address that since this is a one way street and you refuse to
accommodate the way we addressed every issue you had at this exact time last week? Instead, you got all your answers and then said “I’m not
doing that.”
Adrian is never picked up at school. I pay $125 an hour. I’d prefer to pay that for the time I spend with him.
And given the pressing topic, and one that you refuse to reply to for some reason- can you speak to the math situation and get back to me on
that! I see him in less than two hours. It is always this way with you.
On 12/19/2024 at 01:07 PM, Christine Moyer wrote:
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/19/2024 at 01:08 PM)
Subject:Re: Adrian’s Math
Attachments:IMG_2493.PNG (129 KB)
I did not see a response for OFW sent on Dec 17.
On 12/19/2024 at 08:34 AM, Robert Moyer wrote:
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/19/2024 at 01:02 PM)
Subject:Re: Adrian’s Math
I see Adrian today. I will want to discuss this with him. Are you planning to update me so we can work together or is this another unilateral
decision?
On 12/18/2024 at 12:19 PM, Robert Moyer wrote:
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/19/2024 at 07:02 AM)
Subject:Re: Adrian’s Marh
So I think that you are required to inform me about major educational decisions, such as class placement or pursuing advanced placement, via
the Our Family Wizard (OFW) platform.
You should give me at least seven days' notice so that I can provide feedback. After considering my input, then you can then make the final
decision based on your authority.
For something like this in the middle of a toxic divorce where I have watched Adrain flail for months emotionally and academically, I don't
expect that formality, but I'd like to confer.
